verses.roman:
prabhu kahe,--caturāli chāḍa, sanātana
śaktyāveśāvatārera śuna vivarana

synonyms: prabhu kahe—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu replied; caturāli—very intelligent argument; chāḍa—give up; sanātana—O Sanātana; śakti-āveśa-avatārera—of the especially empowered incarnations; śuna—hear; vivaraṇa—the description.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu replied, "O Sanātana, you must give up your intelligent tricks. Just try to understand the meaning of the śaktyāveśa-avatāra.
